00457 ObexResult ObexFtpServer::Open()
00458 {
00459     return Open("*://{target=H'F9EC7BC4-953C-11D2-984E-525400DC9E09'}",
00460         ObexServerDispatcher::SdbAutoRegister);
00461 }   // Open
00462

00469 }   // Open

00479 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00480     AcceptConnection

00482 ObexResult ObexFtpServer::AcceptConnectRequest()

00484     return m_server.HandleConnectionRequest(ObexObject::RespOk);
00485 }   // AcceptConnection
00486 
00487 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00488     RejectConnection
00489     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00490 ObexResult ObexFtpServer::RejectConnectRequest(
00491     ObexObject::ResponseCode resp_code)
00492 {
00493     // To reject a connection an error response code must be passed!
00494     ASSERT_DEBUG(resp_code != ObexObject::RespOk);
00495 
00496     return m_server.HandleConnectionRequest(resp_code);
00497 }   // RejectConnection

00596
